EmailTemplate.name: WBR-202212-HHS-ENT-SWBR-BECKERS-ANNUALSURVERY.Email 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to register for our webinar on the present and future state of telehealth
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JOIN US Executive Insights on the Present and Future State of Virtual Care
December 8 | 1 p.m. Eastern Image Businesswoman showing doctor something on tablet
There’s still time to register for our webinar and gain insights from the 2022 Telehealth Benchmark Survey results.
Tony Burke, SVP of Partnerships and Innovation for Hospitals and Health Systems at Teladoc Health, will lead us through the survey results.
By attending this webinar, you’ll learn: About the maturity of virtual care, system-wide use cases and utilization What top hospital leaders look for in a virtual care solution How partnering with an industry leader can reveal unparalleled opportunities The importance of integration, clinician adoption and secure operational support in improving access to care
Register now <[[https://go.beckershospitalreview.com/hit/-executive-insights-on-the-present-and-future-state-of-telehealth?utm_source=teladoc-health&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=survey-results-webinar]]>
Speaker
Tony Burke SVP Partnerships & Innovation Teladoc Health
About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
